name: cordova-plugin-hot-updates
description: Cordova plugin for automatic over-the-air (OTA) hot updates using WebView Reload approach. Enables seamless web content updates without requiring App Store approval.

scripts.verify: node -e "console.log('Verifying package structure...'); const fs = require('fs'); ['www/HotUpdates.js', 'src/ios/HotUpdates.h', 'src/ios/HotUpdates.m', 'plugin.xml', 'LICENSE', 'README.md'].forEach(f => { if (!fs.existsSync(f)) throw new Error('Missing required file: ' + f); }); console.log('✓ All required files present');"
scripts.pack-test:
npm pack && echo '
✓ Package created. Test installation with: cordova plugin add ./cordova-plugin-hot-updates-*.tgz'
